title: Permanently Banned for no reason.
body:
Can someone explain why i got banned? Can this be fixed?

This is what I said in the match.

Game 1
DarkLegendZxD: akali can we switch lanes
DarkLegendZxD: alright
DarkLegendZxD: i hate heim
DarkLegendZxD: heimdinger'
DarkLegendZxD: wheres thay gank
DarkLegendZxD: no
DarkLegendZxD: gotta win lane against heim
DarkLegendZxD: sure
DarkLegendZxD: akali ur a cow
DarkLegendZxD: kys
DarkLegendZxD: akali ks and run
DarkLegendZxD: much skill
DarkLegendZxD: shut up akali
DarkLegendZxD: vayne inting
DarkLegendZxD: gj
DarkLegendZxD: akali report urself
DarkLegendZxD: go bot since you want kills so bad
DarkLegendZxD: 2 bot
DarkLegendZxD: have fun
DarkLegendZxD: report akali
DarkLegendZxD: please report akali
DarkLegendZxD: sits around and watches until i die
DarkLegendZxD: then steals kill
DarkLegendZxD: good job
DarkLegendZxD: YOUR THE NOOB AKALI CARE ABOUT KILLS INSTEAD OF TEAM
DarkLegendZxD: /
DarkLegendZxD: ?
DarkLegendZxD: you go in and ks akali thats how
DarkLegendZxD: ok
DarkLegendZxD: gj
DarkLegendZxD: wukong invade
DarkLegendZxD: invade there jg and lvl up faster
DarkLegendZxD: vayne
DarkLegendZxD: tank if im low....
DarkLegendZxD: zoe ur losing top
DarkLegendZxD: trade back
DarkLegendZxD: u fed him so hard zoe
DarkLegendZxD: zoe ur 0 5
DarkLegendZxD: zoe go bot
DarkLegendZxD: 0 6
DarkLegendZxD: nice feed zoe
DarkLegendZxD: thank zoe by dropping a report for feeding lol
DarkLegendZxD: so?
DarkLegendZxD: more kills
DarkLegendZxD: its a joke
DarkLegendZxD: ur probably 5
DarkLegendZxD: nice ult
DarkLegendZxD: ?
DarkLegendZxD: ok
DarkLegendZxD: not ur fault wukong
DarkLegendZxD: close xD
DarkLegendZxD: wp
DarkLegendZxD: ?
DarkLegendZxD: ur 0 7
DarkLegendZxD: rhanks ezreal
DarkLegendZxD: ?
DarkLegendZxD: that lux has root of a tree
DarkLegendZxD: dont get under lux's root of a tree
DarkLegendZxD: zoe cant 1v1 anyone
DarkLegendZxD: cant even beat adc

DarkLegendZxD: idk why but i always carry when im mid lol
DarkLegendZxD: bad luck top
DarkLegendZxD: im unranked
DarkLegendZxD: i dont even have 20 champs lol
DarkLegendZxD: wp
DarkLegendZxD: zoe u hit monster to kill me...
DarkLegendZxD: zoe tolling team lol
DarkLegendZxD: GJ
DarkLegendZxD: WP
DarkLegendZxD: that ult lux
DarkLegendZxD: gj
DarkLegendZxD: my non exsitant legs after that root
DarkLegendZxD: i just stopped running
DarkLegendZxD: nice ult lux
DarkLegendZxD: real nice
DarkLegendZxD: how would i know?
DarkLegendZxD: tthat root has cancer attached to it
DarkLegendZxD: surrender
DarkLegendZxD: camping much?
DarkLegendZxD: run
DarkLegendZxD: PUSH
DarkLegendZxD: PUSH
DarkLegendZxD: U HAVE $) SECS FOOL
DarkLegendZxD: 40
DarkLegendZxD: no
DarkLegendZxD: gg

replies.body: Looking into these logs, calling someone a cow is one thing but telling somebody to kill themselves just doesn't fly in this community.  Overall it looks like the account has been degrading players and already received a final warning on the 12th.  As a result, the next step would be a permanent suspension even if it was super minor.  If you'd like to contest the suspension, our PB team is available to you via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
